moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Nuzzle
moves.description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Entrainment
moves.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

moves.name: Spark
moves.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Swift
moves.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Trump Card
moves.description: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its attack power.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Entrainment
moves.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.
